text: Creed II is a 2018 American boxing movie directed by Steven Caple Jr.. It is the sequel to the 2015 movie Creed and the eighth movie in the Rocky franchise. It stars Michael B. Jordan, Sylvester Stallone and Tessa Thompson. title: Creed II
